Description:
Downsize or Invest in Central Drysdale
You can sell the car because this lovely brick veneer unit is only a short walk to the supermarket, shopping centre and all that Drysdale has to offer. The spacious lounge and dining room are situated off the front entrance hall featuring a northerly aspect.
The property includes gas heating, a single garage & a small fully enclosed back yard. Currently tenanted to excellent tenants on a short term lease this property is a readymade investment or can be available soon with vacant possession.

Description:
Modern Family Living
Positioned in a much sought after area of Drysdale just a short stroll to the park and minutes to the heart of town, this modern family home features quality hardwood flooring, ducted heating throughout and an open plan layout providing practical living. The L-shaped meals, living and kitchen area featuring all the mod cons such as stone bench tops and quality S/S appliances, opening onto the fully equipped theatre room.
Boasting 4 bedrooms the master with WIR and full ensuite complete with dbl vanity and shower, the remaining 3 kid's bedrooms all have BIR and are central to the family bathroom and kids play room/3rd living area.
Positioned on a generous 603sqm(approx.) allotment, externally the property features large undercover entertainment area, side gated driveway ideal for that boat or caravan, an oversized DLUG, large garden shed with roller door, water tanks - the list goes on.
Why go to the trouble of building when it is all right here?
Insights: 17 Sundial Dve, DRYSDALE VIC 3222 was last sold in 2012 and 35 other 4 bedroom house in DRYSDALE have recently been sold.

Description:
STYLISH FAMILY HOME IN THE HEART OF DRYSDALE (APP. 725 SQM)
Perfect in every way with land approx. 725 SQM, 7 year old home of approx. 33 sqs (inc. garage), parklands just over the road and short walk to town centre. Boasting formal lounge/dining, open plan living with doors opening to undercover alfresco area, rumpus or third living allowing flexibility for multi purpose use. Study plus four generous bedrooms, the master has large ensuite and WIR while remaining have BIR's, central bathroom, sep.toilet and updated laundry. Features inc. superb new gourmet kitchen, loads of storage, ducted heating, split system, security system and top grade appliances/fittings. Landscaped gardens with vegetable patch and fruit trees, double garage with access to rear, garden shed, tank, so much more will IMPRESS.

Description:
OFFERS INVITED..Family Home in a Quiet Location. 1095m2
VENDOR SAYS SELL....If you are looking for a family home with a bit of extra space you may have found the one. Situated on 1095m2 of land this brick veneer home is tucked away in a quiet location which is still a short distance from central Drysdale and the local schools. The main entrance hall is tiled and will lead you past the formal lounge and master bedroom to the central hub of the home where the open plan living, dining and kitchen look out over the private and spacious rear yard. The kitchen features ample bench space and boasts a gas cook top and dishwasher. The home is heated by gas ducted heating and cooled by a split system air conditioner. Outside there is ample room for the toys with a double garage, double carport and access down the side of the house for trailers and boats. Book your inspection today.
Marcus Illingworth : 0410 308 722

Description:
Rural Living in the Heart of Drysdale
Rare opportunity to secure this 1.22 acre (4937.98sqm) just minutes to the heart of Drysdale and its amenities & attractions.
Offering a solid brick home comprising 3 bedrooms plus study, the master with full ensuite and central bathroom featuring spa. The huge split level living area comes with new carpet, feature fireplace and bar which leads to dining area and large kitchen with electric appliances and island bench. Externally offering mature fruit trees, solar panels and a tropical style heated pool and BBQ area ideal for the entertainer! With large water tanks and driveway access to rear paddock, also providing multiple shedding including garden shed, chook sheds, a large storage shed which part has been converted into a studio and triple garage at the front of the home.
Providing plenty of room to move and just minutes walk to town, this home is a must see!

Description:
Central Drysdale- What A Location!
Leave the car at home and walk! This immaculate 3 bedroom unit is situated an easy stroll to all that Drysdale has on offer. The supermarket is just 2 minutes away, schools and all other facilities just a few minutes more. The kitchen and meals area is spacious and fully equipped with electric cooking and dish washer. The lounge is also of generous proportions and is kept comfortable with electric heating. Undercover outdoor living, neutral decor, recent repaint, workshop space in garage, excellent fencing, new hot water service are just some of this very neat properties many features. Excellent as an investment property or for those purchasers looking to downsize. Currently let to exceptional tenants but available with vacant possession if desired. Call us now to book your inspection.
Maree Humphrey : 0408 504 042

Description:
Lifestyle Acre, Walk into Town
This 5 bedroom family home epitomises the lifestyle we love in semi rural Drysdale. Situated within walking distance of the township and an easy bike ride to schools, with a sense of space and room to grow the veggies and raise the chooks, this substantial steel framed BV home sits in the centre of just over an acre of land. The position of house and ample shedding has been well thought out to ensure maximum use of the area, and, if location is an important consideration in addition to size, this one really does have everything going for it!
The 20 year old colonial, ranch style home, surrounded by beautiful colorful gardens watered via several tanks, is the perfect choice for this block and has been cleverly built to capitalise on a northerly aspect. Each of the spaciously appointed rooms enjoys warm winters and cooler summers, due to the appealing wrap around verandahs and reverse cycle heating and cooling, but the real highlights of this home are undoubtedly the generous living areas incorporating formal lounge/dining and informal family/meals either side of the enormous farmhouse style kitchen. Here you will find St George appliances, masses of storage and bench space, a central island and huge walk in pantry.
With 4 full sized bedrooms plus a study or 5th bedroom, all with built in robes, the master's being walk through to the ensuite and separate wc, there is room for all the kids and a guest or two! There is a central family bathroom, second separate wc and large internal farmhouse style laundry with dual tubs, vanity basin and ample storage, specifically designed to allow for those coming in from shed or garden to clean up beforehand. When it comes to storage, it is here aplenty, double broom/utility cupboard, 2 double linen closets and then, of course, there is all that shedding.
The larger of the two has been split into individual zones including a large workshop, single garage with slab floor and roller door, and a double garage space with sliding doors. Further to this is the open machinery shed capable of housing a further 3 large vehicles. Both sheds feed into water tanks to hydrate the beautiful mix of Australian Native and English Country garden with its circular drive, water feature, fruit trees and veggie patch.
If you are looking for a well priced lifestyle move with room to enjoy your country activities and the convenience of town close by, do not miss this one!
- 4047 sqm approx.
- Walk to shopping centre and schools
- Spacious family home with beautiful gardens
- Abundant shedding

Description:
Substantial Family Home on 1270m2
Upon entering this home you will notice the sweeping timber raked ceilings that provides a feeling of space.
The space isn't just an illusion as this home offers 5 bedrooms and 3 separate living zones, enough room for all family members to find a quiet spot to relax. The formal lounge room has a lovely northerly aspect and is currently offering a glimpse of the bay. The kitchen is incredibly spacious with an abundance of bench space. The east wing of the home offers 3 of the 5 bedrooms including a central bathroom in addition to the separate spa room. The master bedroom features a private ensuite and WIR.
The rumpus room is generously proportioned measuring approximately 10.5m x 6m providing a broad range of uses. The irregular shaped garage would comfortably fit 2-3 cars in addition to plenty of workshop space. With some paint, carpet and some TLC this home will return to its former glory. Contact agent to arrange your private inspection.
Marcus Illingworth : 0410 308 722

Description:
Attention Developers, Tradesmen and Young Families
Set at the front of a huge parcel of land of 2000m2 approx. lies this solid 3 bedroom, one bathroom brick home. Comprising two large living areas, retro kitchen/dining with loads of potential to renovate or just move straight in. There is garaging for 2 cars as well as a workshop and tool shed. A wide variety of well-established fruit trees and vegetable garden round off this fantastic property. With residential one zoning, this is a great opportunity to develop (STCA).
A property of this size does not come on the market that often. Close to schools, sporting clubs and public transport. Be quick and inspect today

Description:
Period 1960's Blonde Brick in Central Drysdale
A period 1960's Blonde Brick boasts a formal entrance with original art-deco features, polished floor boards & rear sunroom on approx. 725m2. This brilliant home is a testament to the 1960's builder's ability to construct a solid timeless house, with the integrity of this period home being retained. A charming property comprising 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, 1 bathroom with period features & a triple lockup garage with mechanics pit. Ideal location within an easy walk to town center, schools & parks.

Description:
The Best of Both Worlds and Water Views
With a spectacular outlook from every window in this Architectually designed home and Situated only moments from Drysdale's main shopping centre & Point Lonsdale and Ocean Grove sandy beaches is a rare opportunity to purchase 5 glorious acres in one of the most fertile areas of the Bellarine Peninsula.
Found on a beautifully quiet road surrounded by open fields this spacious home ensures that every room has a view of either the natural landscape or the panoramic vista across Port Philip Bay, Swan bay to Queenscliff and beyond. From the entry, the main lounge and dining rooms enjoy this view from full walls of windows and also boast an open fire place in the centre of the room and a fully functioning bar to one end.
The hub of the home is definitely the enormous country style, timber kitchen with walk in pantry and vintage wood stove but also contains a more modern gas cooktop and stainless steel electric oven. The open family meals and living rooms are situated here as well with further walls of glass opening onto a paved entertaining area and overlooking the property to the line of towering pine trees & wood lot to the north.
4 large sized bedrooms, (king sized master with walk in robe almost the size of a bedroom itself, and equally spacious ensuite with double vanity and shower plus separate wc, all opening onto a private courtyard fernery) lie in a wing of their own that boasts a uniquely shaped (to also capture views) rumpus room and study/fourth bedroom plus family bathroom, vast laundry, wc and additional powder room for guests.
The home is heated by solid fuel, reverse cycle heating/cooling, large open fireplace in formal lounge, woodfire canara in main living, gas heater (in the rumpus) but has been cleverly designed to capture sun in winter and remain cool in summer. Stunning slate floors and exposed timber ceilings (some cathedral), provide an ambience that is distinctly suited to the surrounds but also has the potential to be modernised for a more contemporary feel.
The property will please all members of the family with horse paddocks and stables, a triple car brick garage with ample storage and additional shedding with concrete, power and water which could be used as an additional studio, further accomodaion or work-shop shed.. Tank water services the home with an abundance of storage that has never run out even with a full household in the worst drought conditions. The established gardens and the HUGE variety of fruit treesYour dream of self sustainable living could easily become a reality here.
- 5 acres approx.
- Panoramic water views
- 33 squares of living (approx.)
- Abundant garaging and shedding
- Close to Ocean Grove beaches, Drysdale and Point Lonsdale
Also view standalone web site www.45banksroad.com
Land: 5 acres approx.
